content: > free version on the blog here 1 > payhip version 2 and etsy > version 3 about the pattern -------------------- this is a beginner-friendly tunisian crochet baby blanket pattern with a lattice of stylized flowers also known as nordic stars a non-curling honeycomb border is included in the pattern and worked at the same time as the blanket you can replace it with a border of reverse stitches the project looks best when worked in a single color of yarn allowing the raised stitches to show off the pattern on the smooth background skill level -------------- beginner in tunisian crochet you will use 4 stitches on every row the most fundamental ones in tunisian crochet measurements --------------- when meeting gauge the blanket measures 62 cm or 24 5 across the top and 85 cm or 33 5 in length you can add more repeats or use a different yarn which will result in a different blanket size notions ---------- - yarn 350 g or 910 meters of size 3 baby acrylic yarn at about 260 meters per 100 grams - hook tunisian crochet hook with cable or straight 6 mm or hook size that gets you gauge - tapestry needle - scissors sample made in himalaya everyday bambus yarn 80% acrylic 20% bamboo with 260 meters per 100 g color 236-28 1 https //yarnandy com/nordic-star-tunisian-crochet-baby-blanket-pattern/ 2 https //payhip com/b/wotxw 3 https //yarnandy etsy com/listing/4388616143
